attributes.action: Stop the UK from supplying weapons to Saudi Arabia that fuels the Yemen war.
attributes.additional_details: Yemen are currently going through the worlds worst humanitarian crisis - more than 24 million people are in need of humanitarian aid which is 80% of the population. Including 12 million children. By stopping the supply of weapons and troops to Saudi we can help the Yemeni people hopefully recover slightly from this crisis and give them aid instead. Austria, Belgium, Germany, Finland and 4 other European countries have already stopped arms sales to Saudi Arabia, so why can’t we?
attributes.background: Stop supporting and supplying weapons to Saudi Arabia in the Yemen war.
